summary: Story of a young couple whose fathers are prison bound.
cast: Hiroshi Kawaguchi|Hitomi Nozoe|Aiko Mimasu|Eitarô Ozawa|Sachiko Murase|Saiko Mima|Kazuko Wakamatsu|Kaoru Shimizudani|Yosuke Irie|Ken Yamaguchi|Gai Harada|Toshiko Hashimoto|Naoyasu Itô|Kanji Kawahara|Koji Kosugi|Naoko Matsudaira|Bontarô Miake|Nobuo Minakata|Fumiko Murata|Shôji Narita|Akira Natsuki|Kikuko Nishikawa|Joe Ohara|Tsuneko Sudô|Shinji Takada|Eiichi Takamura|Mitsuko Takesato|Ken Wakamatsu|Toshio Yonezawa|Kanshô Yoshii
title: Kuchizuke
